nodes.text: Aries was a A-wing pilot in Riot Squadron, a squadron that served both the Rebel Alliance and the New Republic. At some point during Aries' service to Riot Squadron, the pilot was killed. Several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, during the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing's attack on the frigate Hellion's Dare, Riot Squadron pilot Wyl Lark thought of the names of deceased squadron personnel, including Aries.
Aries was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
